segments.text: Will you give your friends a buzz and put out a feeler to see if they like to offer me a loan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give them a buzz ? What can I say to them ? Say that you want a loan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want to make sure that there is possibility of giving us a loan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And they , too , want to make sure their loan is worthwhile .
segments.speaker: S2
